title: Your Downtown Apartment Is At A Great Low Price, Hurry In!
posting_body: ['Avant Apartments', '1420 South Figueroa Street', 'Los Angeles, CA 90015', 'show contact info', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'FIND LUXURY AT OUR month leases are available (rates vary)', 'Get the walk-ability you love and the luxury you expect from your downtown Los Angeles, CA apartment home.', 'Explore a new studio, one, or two-bedroom apartment with a boutique ambiance that keeps pace with your busy lifestyle and uncompromising taste.', 'Avant South Park Apartments is a friendly and intimate community offering a true sense of connection and a real chance to get to know your neighbors in a relaxed setting.', 'Old school inspiration meets a new school approach to life at these Downtown apartments for rent.', 'You’ll appreciate spacious and modern residences ideal for entertaining as well as relaxing.', 'Enjoy day to night amenities that include a rooftop terrace with incredible views of the city, onsite fully equipped fitness center, pool & spa and much more.', 'A few steps from your door, discover major shopping and dining.', 'L.A.’s nightlife, culture, and the Studios are only a short drive away.', 'Contact us today to book a tour and discover your new haven at our beautiful Downtown Los Angeles, CA luxury Apartments.', 'Welcome to distinction on your terms.', 'Welcome to The Avant South Park Apartments!', 'Amenities Include:', 'Stainless Steel Appliances with Gas Ranges', 'LA Nightlife and Culture', 'European Styled Cabinetry with Modern Porcelain Tile Designer Backsplashes', 'Short walk to LA Live., Los Angeles Convention Center, <URL> Stadium, Shopping, and More', 'Free WiFi in Community Areas', 'USB Charging Ports in Kitchen and Bedrooms', 'Faux Wood Floors in Living Areas',
